Interesting, something else in common.  I grew up around mediums and
one one of the few nationally recognized (i.e. government)
organizations - the Morris Pratt Institute (www.morrispratt.org).  My
great uncle was a big part of the school.  Run like a regular
school/institution, and is the primary educational facility serving
the National Spiritualist Association.

I also do some medium work as well.


Marty
